text: Hi <@U027BLET13R>  I run a software team in the uk and we specialise in enterprise level integrations, custom software development projects and consultancy. Love to grab a call with you and step you through our process and how we can help. I have sent you a pm. Look forward to speaking with you.

Hi everyone! We are looking for developers who can help us out on the application building with HubSpot API, integration - creating custom workflow applications. if there's anyone who would like to know more about this opportunity please drop a message.
